classic.name: Colline du Château
classic.description: This historic hilltop park offers dramatic city & sea views, a man-made waterfall & a cafe.

classic.name: Jardin Exotique d’Èze
classic.description: This mountaintop garden featuring mostly succulents is known for its picturesque views of the ocean.

classic.name: Villa Ephrussi de Rothschild
classic.description: Chic early 20th-century villa with 9 separately themed gardens overlooking the Mediterranean Sea.
classic.address: 1 Av. Ephrussi de Rothschild, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, France

classic.name: Private Cars Collection of HSH Prince of Monaco
classic.description: This spacious museum showcases a wide range of Prince Rainier III's high-end, vintage automobiles.

classic.name: Fontaine du Soleil
classic.description: Landmark bronze sculpture of Greek god Apollo, a focus of local jokes & anecdotes since the 1950s.

classic.name: Casino de Monte-Carlo
classic.description: Elegant Beaux-Arts building, made famous in film and literature, with upscale casino & performances.

classic.name: Prince's Palace of Monaco
classic.description: Prince of Monaco's 13th-century residence, with lavish state apartments open to public seasonally.

classic.name: Cathédrale Saint-Nicolas de Nice
classic.description: Byzantine-style place of Orthodox worship & gardens at the site of Tsarevich Nicholas' death.

foodie.name: Café Fino | Lunch - Coffee Shop - Brunch in Nice
foodie.description: Contemporary venue serving a variety of classic breakfast & lunch plates, plus hot & cold drinks.

foodie.description: Seafood, steaks & Mediterranean classics in a stylish, contemporary venue with a terrace.

foodie.name: Fairmont Monte Carlo
foodie.description: Plush hotel featuring refined quarters, a posh restaurant & a spa, plus a champagne bar.

foodie.name: Marché Aux Fleurs - Cours Saleya - Nice
foodie.description: Long-running outdoor market featuring fresh cut flowers as well as local produce & food products.

foodie.name: HOBO COFFEE
foodie.description: Specialty brews & casual bites served in a quaint coffeehouse with a terrace & a homespun vibe.

foodie.name: La Maison De Celine Pâtisserie
foodie.address: Table service until 5 pm. Sur place jusqu’à 17h, 24 Rue de la Liberté, 06000 Nice, France

adventure.name: Coastal Path
adventure.description: Picturesque walkway with stone steps leading through towns & beaches along the sea.

adventure.name: Colline du Château
adventure.description: This historic hilltop park offers dramatic city & sea views, a man-made waterfall & a cafe.

adventure.name: Promenade du Paillon
adventure.description: Green space with diverse plants & trees, plus fountains, a play area for kids & a reflecting pool.

adventure.name: Parc du Mont Boron
adventure.description: Picturesque elevated park offering walking trails amid sea, mountain & city views.

adventure.name: Jardins Saint-Martin
adventure.description: Peaceful, terraced public gardens featuring Mediterranean flora, statuary & views of the sea.

adventure.name: Chemin de Nietzsche
adventure.description: This mountainous path is popular with hikers for its spectacular scenery & Mediterranean views.

adventure.name: Princess Grace Japanese Garden
adventure.description: Intimate garden featuring Japanese-style landscaping around a pond with a bridge & a tea house.

adventure.name: Jardin Albert 1er
adventure.description: 19th-century public park with mature trees, lawns, pools, a bandstand & summer open-air theater.

adventure.name: Jardins Biovès
adventure.description: Intimate park known for its whimsical citrus sculptures during the annual Lemon Festival.

cultural.description: Ornate center for Riviera art & artifacts to the belle époque, including Napoleon's death mask.

cultural.description: Early 1900s copy of a classical Greek villa, featuring antique-filled interiors & Cap Ferrat views.
